title: PowerShell Disable Microsoft Defender
description: Detects PowerShell commands that disable Defender real-time monitoring.
sigma:
title: PowerShell Disable Microsoft Defender
id: RULE-017
description: Detects PowerShell commands that disable Defender real-time monitoring.
author: detpack-lab
status: stable
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: powershell
detection:
  selection:
    EventID: 4104
    ScriptBlockText|contains: DisableRealtimeMonitoring
  condition: selection
falsepositives:
  - Approved security tooling changes (change control)
level: high
tags:
  - attack.t1562
  - attack.defense_evasion
